subject: Subject
token_is_smallest_text_unit: A token is the smallest unit of text with which an AI model processes information. A token can be a word, part of a word, symbol, or punctuation mark.
tokenization_description: Tokenization occurs through a predefined algorithm, which allows us to calculate what resources were spent on analyzing your question and generating a response to it.
